column4: Hi, do you know some way to record the sound output with gtk-recordmydektop?
select the record sounds check box?
i never record audio with it so im not sure. but i assume ticking the checkbox serves that function.
i find this http://ppa.launchpad.net/techm3/outrec/ubuntu/pool/main/o/, this record the output from my card later i can join with de video, thx for helpme
